00036 using namespace std;
00037 using namespace Hypertable;
00038 using namespace Hyperspace;

00041 ClientKeepaliveHandler::ClientKeepaliveHandler(Comm *comm, PropertiesPtr &cfg,
00042                                                Session *session)
00043   : m_dead(false), m_comm(comm), m_session(session), m_session_id(0),
00044     m_last_known_event(0) {
00045   int error;
00046   uint16_t master_port;
00047   String master_host;
00048 
00049   HT_TRY("getting config values",
00050     m_verbose = cfg->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose");
00051     master_host = cfg->get_str("Hyperspace.Master.Host");
00052     master_port = cfg->get_i16("Hyperspace.Master.Port");
00053     m_lease_interval = cfg->get_i32("Hyperspace.Lease.Interval");
00054     m_keep_alive_interval = cfg->get_i32("Hyperspace.KeepAlive.Interval"));
00055 
00056   HT_EXPECT(InetAddr::initialize(&m_master_addr, master_host.c_str(),
00057             master_port), Error::BAD_DOMAIN_NAME);
00058 
00059   boost::xtime_get(&m_last_keep_alive_send_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00060   boost::xtime_get(&m_jeopardy_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00061   xtime_add_millis(m_jeopardy_time, m_lease_interval);
00062 
00063   InetAddr::initialize(&m_local_addr, INADDR_ANY, 0);
00064 
00065   DispatchHandlerPtr dhp(this);
00066   m_comm->create_datagram_receive_socket(&m_local_addr, 0x10, dhp);
00067 
00068   CommBufPtr cbp(Hyperspace::Protocol::create_client_keepalive_request(
00069       m_session_id, m_last_known_event));
00070 
00071   if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_master_addr, m_local_addr, cbp)
00072       != Error::OK)) {
00073     HT_ERRORF("Unable to send datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00074     exit(1);
00075   }
00076 
00077   if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(m_keep_alive_interval, this))
00078       != Error::OK) {
00079     HT_ERRORF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00080     exit(1);
00081   }
00082 }

00084 
00085 void ClientKeepaliveHandler::handle(Hypertable::EventPtr &event) {
00086   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00087   int error;
00088 
00089   if (m_dead)
00090     return;
00091 
00098   if (event->type == Hypertable::Event::MESSAGE) {
00099     const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event->payload;
00100     size_t decode_remain = event->payload_len;
00101 
00102     try {
00103 
00104       // sanity check command code
00105       if (event->header.command >= Protocol::COMMAND_MAX)
00106         HT_THROWF(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Invalid command (%llu)",
00107                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00108 
00109       switch (event->header.command) {
00110       case Protocol::COMMAND_KEEPALIVE:
00111         {
00112           uint64_t session_id;
00113           uint32_t notifications;
00114           uint64_t handle, event_id;
00115           uint32_t event_mask;
00116           const char *name;
00117           const uint8_t *post_notification_buf;
00118           size_t post_notification_size;
00119 
00120           if (m_session->get_state() == Session::STATE_EXPIRED)
00121             return;
00122 
00123           // update jeopardy time
00124           memcpy(&m_jeopardy_time, &m_last_keep_alive_send_time,
00125                  sizeof(boost::xtime));
00126           xtime_add_millis(m_jeopardy_time, m_lease_interval);
00127 
00128           session_id = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00129           error = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00130 
00131           if (error != Error::OK) {
00132             HT_ERRORF("Master session error - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00133             expire_session();
00134             return;
00135           }
00136 
00137           if (m_session_id == 0) {
00138             m_session_id = session_id;
00139             if (!m_conn_handler_ptr) {
00140               m_conn_handler_ptr = new ClientConnectionHandler(m_comm,
00141                   m_session, m_lease_interval);
00142               m_conn_handler_ptr->set_verbose_mode(m_verbose);
00143               m_conn_handler_ptr->set_session_id(m_session_id);
00144             }
00145           }
00146 
00147           notifications = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00148 
00149           // Start Issue 313 instrumentation
00150           post_notification_buf = decode_ptr;
00151           post_notification_size = decode_remain;
00152 
00153           for (uint32_t i=0; i<notifications; i++) {
00154             handle = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00155             event_id = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00156             event_mask = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00157 
00158             HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle);
00159             if (iter == m_handle_map.end()) {
00160               // We have a bad notification, ie. a notification for a handle not in m_handle_map
00161               boost::xtime now;
00162               boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00163 
00164               HT_ERROR_OUT << "[Issue 313] Received bad notification session=" << m_session_id
00165                            << ", handle=" << handle << ", event_id=" << event_id
00166                            << ", event_mask=" << event_mask << HT_END;
00167               // ignore all notifications in this keepalive message (don't kick up to
00168               // application) this avoids multiple notifications being sent to app (Issue 314)
00169               notifications=0;
00170 
00171               // Check if we already have a pending bad notification for this handle
00172               BadNotificationHandleMap::iterator uiter = m_bad_handle_map.find(handle);
00173               if (uiter == m_bad_handle_map.end()) {
00174                 // if not then store
00175                 m_bad_handle_map[handle] = now;
00176               }
00177               else {
00178                 // if we do then check against grace period
00179                 uint64_t time_diff=xtime_diff_millis((*uiter).second ,now);
00180                 if (time_diff > ms_bad_notification_grace_period) {
00181                   HT_ERROR_OUT << "[Issue 313] Still receiving bad notification after grace "
00182                                << "period=" << ms_bad_notification_grace_period
00183                                << "ms, session=" << m_session_id
00184                                << ", handle=" << handle << ", event_id=" << event_id
00185                                << ", event_mask=" << event_mask << HT_END;
00186                   HT_ASSERT(false);
00187                 }
00188               }
00189               break;
00190             }
00191             else {
00192               // This is a good notification, clear any prev bad notifications for this handle
00193               BadNotificationHandleMap::iterator uiter = m_bad_handle_map.find(handle);
00194               if (uiter != m_bad_handle_map.end()) {
00195                 HT_ERROR_OUT << "[Issue 313] Previously bad notification cleared within grace "
00196                              << "period=" << ms_bad_notification_grace_period
00197                              << "ms, session=" << m_session_id
00198                              << ", handle=" << handle << ", event_id=" << event_id
00199                              << ", event_mask=" << event_mask << HT_END;
00200                 m_bad_handle_map.erase(uiter);
00201               }
00202             }
00203 
00204             if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_ATTR_SET ||
00205                 event_mask == EVENT_MASK_ATTR_DEL ||
00206                 event_mask == EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED ||
00207                 event_mask == EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_REMOVED)
00208               decode_vstr(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00209             else if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_LOCK_ACQUIRED)
00210               decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00211             else if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_LOCK_GRANTED) {
00212               decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00213               decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00214             }
00215           }
00216 
00217           decode_ptr = post_notification_buf;
00218           decode_remain = post_notification_size;
00219           // End Issue 313 instrumentation
00220 
00221           for (uint32_t i=0; i<notifications; i++) {
00222             handle = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00223             event_id = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00224             event_mask = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00225 
00226             HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle);
00227             if (iter == m_handle_map.end()) {
00228               HT_ERROR_OUT << "[Issue 313] this should never happen bad notification session="
00229                   << m_session_id << ", handle=" << handle << ", event_id=" << event_id
00230                   << ", event_mask=" << event_mask << HT_END;
00231               assert(false);
00232             }
00233 
00234             ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state = (*iter).second;
00235 
00236             if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_ATTR_SET ||
00237                 event_mask == EVENT_MASK_ATTR_DEL ||
00238                 event_mask == EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED ||
00239                 event_mask == EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_REMOVED) {
00240               name = decode_vstr(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00241 
00242               if (event_id <= m_last_known_event)
00243                 continue;
00244 
00245               if (handle_state->callback) {
00246                 if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_ATTR_SET)
00247                   handle_state->callback->attr_set(name);
00248                 else if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_ATTR_DEL)
00249                   handle_state->callback->attr_del(name);
00250                 else if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED)
00251                   handle_state->callback->child_node_added(name);
00252                 else
00253                   handle_state->callback->child_node_removed(name);
00254               }
00255             }
00256             else if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_LOCK_ACQUIRED) {
00257               uint32_t mode = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00258 
00259               if (event_id <= m_last_known_event)
00260                 continue;
00261               if (handle_state->callback)
00262                 handle_state->callback->lock_acquired(mode);
00263             }
00264             else if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_LOCK_RELEASED) {
00265               if (event_id <= m_last_known_event)
00266                 continue;
00267               if (handle_state->callback)
00268                 handle_state->callback->lock_released();
00269             }
00270             else if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_LOCK_GRANTED) {
00271               uint32_t mode = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00272               handle_state->lock_generation = decode_i64(&decode_ptr,
00273                                                          &decode_remain);
00274               if (event_id <= m_last_known_event)
00275                 continue;
00276 
00277               handle_state->lock_status = LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED;
00278               handle_state->sequencer->generation =
00279                   handle_state->lock_generation;
00280               handle_state->sequencer->mode = mode;
00281               handle_state->cond.notify_all();
00282             }
00283 
00284             m_last_known_event = event_id;
00285           }
00292           if (m_conn_handler_ptr->disconnected())
00293             m_conn_handler_ptr->initiate_connection(m_master_addr);
00294 
00295           if (notifications > 0) {
00296             CommBufPtr cbp(Protocol::create_client_keepalive_request(
00297                 m_session_id, m_last_known_event));
00298             boost::xtime_get(&m_last_keep_alive_send_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00299             if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_master_addr, m_local_addr, cbp)
00300                 != Error::OK)) {
00301               HT_ERRORF("Unable to send datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00302               exit(1);
00303             }
00304           }
00305 
00306           m_session->advance_expire_time(m_last_keep_alive_send_time);
00307 
00308           assert(m_session_id == session_id);
00309         }
00310         break;
00311       default:
00312         HT_THROWF(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Unimplemented command (%llu)",
00313                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00314       }
00315     }
00316     catch (Exception &e) {
00317       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00318     }
00319   }
00320   else if (event->type == Hypertable::Event::TIMER) {
00321     boost::xtime now;
00322     int state;
00323 
00324     // !!! fix - what about re-ordered packets?
00325 
00326     if ((state = m_session->get_state()) == Session::STATE_EXPIRED)
00327       return;
00328 
00329     boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00330 
00331     if (state == Session::STATE_SAFE) {
00332       if (xtime_cmp(m_jeopardy_time, now) < 0) {
00333         m_session->state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00334       }
00335     }
00336     else if (m_session->expired()) {
00337       expire_session();
00338       return;
00339     }
00340 
00341     CommBufPtr cbp(Hyperspace::Protocol::create_client_keepalive_request(
00342         m_session_id, m_last_known_event));
00343 
00344     boost::xtime_get(&m_last_keep_alive_send_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00345 
00346     if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_master_addr, m_local_addr, cbp)
00347         != Error::OK)) {
00348       HT_ERRORF("Unable to send datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00349       exit(1);
00350     }
00351 
00352     if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(m_keep_alive_interval, this))
00353         != Error::OK) {
00354       HT_ERRORF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00355       exit(1);
00356     }
00357   }
00358   else {
00359     HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00360   }
00361 }
00362 
00363 
00364 void ClientKeepaliveHandler::expire_session() {
00365   m_session->state_transition(Session::STATE_EXPIRED);
00366   if (m_conn_handler_ptr)
00367     m_conn_handler_ptr->close();
00368   poll(0,0,2000);
00369   m_conn_handler_ptr = 0;
00370   return;
00371 }
00372 
00373 
00374 void ClientKeepaliveHandler::destroy_session() {
00375   int error;
00376 
00377   CommBufPtr cbp(Hyperspace::Protocol::create_client_keepalive_request(
00378                  m_session_id, m_last_known_event, true));
00379 
00380   if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_master_addr, m_local_addr, cbp)
00381       != Error::OK))
00382     HT_ERRORF("Unable to send datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00383 
00384   m_dead = true;
00385   //m_comm->close_socket(m_local_addr);
00386 }
